findings.title: Spelling and Grammatical Errors
findings.description: Several language mistakes were identified in the comments and revert messages in the codebase.

findings.title: Susceptible to Frontrunning Attacks (High Risk)
findings.description: The Timvi system has no protective mechanisms against frontrunning attacks, which can be exploited by monitoring incoming transactions and sending a transaction with a high gas price to benefit from obtained information.

findings.title: Discrepancies with Whitepaper
findings.description: Differences were identified between the system described in the whitepaper and the actual implementation, including discrepancies in insurance requirements, code implementation inconsistencies, and fees maintenance.
